long_description:
# Emerald Shop (MineClonia)

Code under [AGPLv3-or-later](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/agpl-3.0.html) License

EmeraldShop Mod is [Libre/Free Software](https://www.gnu.org/philosophy/free-sw.html), copy and share.

[This is not open source](https://www.gnu.org/philosophy/open-source-misses-the-point.html)!

## Shops

Buy or sell items in your shop!

This mod use [EmeraldBank](https://content.minetest.net/packages/NathanielFreeman/emeraldbank/) mod to work.

Shops keep the earned emeralds in your bank account automaticly!

### Fancy_vend like shops

**What has happened to my fancy_vend like emerald shops?**

**This mod has been split into two**, now fancy_vend like shops have been separated in the [emerald_fancy_vend mod](https://codeberg.org/usrib/fancy_vend)
name: emeraldshop
short_description: Currency like shops to trade with emeralds in your Emeraldbank.
